targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "iot-edge-03")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "IR")
  |> yield(name: "ir_state")
